content:
In this dataset, annotators are asked whether text is offensive. There are three possible labels: not offensive (0), maybe (1), offensive (2)

Human-Rated Examples:


Target Example:
Text: most woman say once you go black you never go back . <repeat> good ! i do n't want any of them filthy bitches giving me aids
Annotation from annotator:
The only valid output is a single integer.
